sanapuuro.sanapuuro.grid

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • sanapuuro.sanapuuro.grid.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends Object
    Grid that is used to get and set letter containers to it.
    Author:
    skaipio

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int height 
      int width 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Grid(int width, int height) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the grid removing all letter containers from it.
      LetterContainer getContainerAt(int x, int y)
      Returns the letter container at given coordinates.
      boolean hasContainerAt(int x, int y)
      Tells whether the grid has a letter container at given coordinates.
      boolean isWithinGrid(int x, int y)
      Checks whether given coordinates are within grid bounds.
      void removeContainer(LetterContainer container) 
      void removeContainerAt(int x, int y)
      Removes the letter container - if there is any - at given coordinates.
      void removeContainersFromGrid(List<LetterContainer> containers) 
      boolean setContainerAt(LetterContainer container, int x, int y)
      Sets the letter container at given coordinates if there is none present yet.
      void setLettersToGridPermanently(List<LetterContainer> containers)
      Sets the currently selected letters to the grid permanently and also removes them from the player's letter pool.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the grid removing all letter containers from it.

      • hasContainerAt

        public boolean hasContainerAt(int x,
                     int y)
        Tells whether the grid has a letter container at given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate
        y - coordinate
        Returns:
        True if grid has letter container at x and y, false otherwise.

      • getContainerAt

        public LetterContainer getContainerAt(int x,
                             int y)
        Returns the letter container at given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate
        y - coordinate
        Returns:
        Returns letter container at x and y, if none exists, returns null.

      • setContainerAt

        public boolean setContainerAt(LetterContainer container,
                     int x,
                     int y)
        Sets the letter container at given coordinates if there is none present yet.
        Parameters:
        container - Letter container to set to x and y.
        x - coordinate
        y - coordinate
        Returns:
        True if letter container was set to grid successfully, false otherwise.

      • removeContainerAt

        public void removeContainerAt(int x,
                     int y)
        Removes the letter container - if there is any - at given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate
        y - coordinate

      • removeContainer

        public void removeContainer(LetterContainer container)

      • removeContainersFromGrid

        public void removeContainersFromGrid(List<LetterContainer> containers)

      • setLettersToGridPermanently

        public void setLettersToGridPermanently(List<LetterContainer> containers)
        Sets the currently selected letters to the grid permanently and also removes them from the player's letter pool.

      • isWithinGrid

        public boolean isWithinGrid(int x,
                   int y)
        Checks whether given coordinates are within grid bounds.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate
        y - coordinate
        Returns:
        True if x and y are within bounds, false otherwise.
